scripts.build: echo "The build step is not required when using JavaScript!" && exit 0
scripts.updateLambda: cp .env.lambda.dev lambda/.env && cd lambda && zip -r ../lambda.zip * .env && cd .. && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name lincolnnguyen-ddb-stream-lambda --zip-file fileb://lambda.zip && rm lambda.zip
scripts.updateLambdaProd: cp .env.lambda.prod lambda/.env && cd lambda && zip -r ../lambda.zip * .env && cd .. && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name lincolnnguyen-ddb-stream-lambda-prod --zip-file fileb://lambda.zip && rm lambda.zip
